page.description: Returns all errors that occurred when synchronizing a List.

return.name: errorObj
return.description: A JSON array containing the errors that occurred when synchronizing a List Control. If no errors occurred, the array will be empty. Each object in the JSON array has the following properties:

property.name: errorType
property.description: The type of error. Can be 'writeConflict', 'serverSide', or 'globalError'.

property.name: path
property.description: The 'path' to get to the row that had the error. If the error was in a child List, the path wil indicate how to navigate to the child row.

page.discussion: Only applies to Lists that have a Detail View. Returns an array of objects containing all errors that occurred when synchronizing the List. One object is created for each error.
